verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees<WH4609> of David<WH1732>. I was glad<WH8055> when they said<WH559> unto me, Let us go<WH3212> into the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068>.
Our feet<WH7272> shall stand<WH5975> within thy gates<WH8179>, O Jerusalem<WH3389>.
Jerusalem<WH3389> is builded<WH1129> as a city<WH5892> that is compact<WH2266> together<WH3162>:

Whither<WH8033> the tribes<WH7626> go up<WH5927>, the tribes<WH7626> of the LORD<WH3050>, unto the testimony<WH5715> of Israel<WH3478>, to give thanks<WH3034> unto the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068>.
For there are set<WH3427> thrones<WH3678> of judgment<WH4941>, the thrones<WH3678> of the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732>. are: Heb. do sit
Pray<WH7592> for the peace<WH7965> of Jerusalem<WH3389>: they shall prosper<WH7951> that love<WH157> thee.
Peace<WH7965> be within thy walls<WH2426>, and prosperity<WH7962> within thy palaces<WH759>.
For my brethren<WH251> and companions'<WH7453> sakes, I will now say<WH1696>, Peace<WH7965> be within thee.
Because of the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> I will seek<WH1245> thy good<WH2896>.
